item.title: Gully drains filled with silt & not draining water away., 17th March
item.description:
Several of the drains along both sides of the A46 are filled with silt & not draining water away. This is from Brockworth Garden Centre to Sunny fields Farm. The water flows down the hill along the side of the road. All of them require attention. I walked along Shurdington Road (A46), with my daughter, to Sunnyfields Farm. This is where I observed both sides of the road.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Shurdington Road, Brockworth, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bus lane and filter lane for Benhall, lights turn red for no reason, 17th March
item.description:
The filter lane for Benhall off the A40 westbound turns red every single time the main carriageway lights turn red. There is absolutely no reason for this, the lights should only turn red when activated by pedestrial crossing. This is delaying buses through the bus lane and cars for no reason. Causing excess pollution through needles braking and acceleration. Please fix. This has been broken since the lights were replaced as part of the A40 works.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gloucester Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Lights are red for no reason

item.title: Deep pothole releasing gravel into road causing cars to travel in the middle of the road, 17th March
item.description:
Whittington road around the corner house with Stanway road - multiple potholes you can't miss them
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 38, Whittington Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocked drains, 17th March
item.description:
We have reported 3 blocked drains in Green Street and it appears work has been done to clear them. We were clearing them ourselves as best we could. This did make a difference initially but mud and debris needs to be cleared also and not sure if this is on the “to do” list. The problem is the mud is being churned up by vehicles constantly trying to use this access only route. We are the only property to be affected by “traffic” churning mud into the entrance of our driveway. Cars are squeezing through the traffic bollards.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Green Street, Brockworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Path needs levelling with more tarmac, 17th March
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Up Hatherley Way, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Drain overflowing in Farm Lane today, 17th March
item.description:
Gutter drain taking overflow on junction with A46 Shurdington Road. This drain needs monitoring for a clear flow. Cleaning would be a good idea has this is taking the water and preventing flow onto A46.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Farm Lane, Shurdington, Tewkesbury

item.title: Crossing audible sound too loud/soft problem, 17th March
item.description:
Caller reported that this pillican crossing is not working correctly and stopping vehicles every 15 seconds or so. Not an issue at this moment in time. However, on monday this is a busy road and will benifit if someone can look into this early tomorrow.
